name: Craig's Nightmare
description:
Welcome to Craig's Nightmare! Follow Craig as he conquers his fear of monsters in the dark! Progress as you learn to discover many kinds of monsters, weapons, and strange tricks. This is a short survival-horror shooter game where you battle out till the end. Get ready to be overwhelmed by the sheer numbers, how long will you survive?

Controls:

WASD - movement

Left click - shooting

This was the first project I used real assets on so I'm excited to share this one with you guys.  This project was also slightly followed by a udemy course by Blackthornprod.  

A tip to this game, I recommend stocking up on ammo.
